www.4forums.com has begun to grow at a more rapid pace. As members increase so does the word of the site get around more rapidly.
 
 The growth will see a variety of good debaters, and ignorant ones. It will also see an increase of posts which we will become more impossible to keep up with. 
 
 Is growth a good thing for the site, or not?
 
 What do you think?
 
 Always Stay Open Minded

Growth is alright, but not too much growth. I like being able to recognize everyone by name and knowing them from previous debates. Once a forum gets too large and the turnover becomes too rapid, then this part of the forum disappears.

I like being able to recognize everyone by name and knowing them from previous debates.
 
 
 Agreed.....

exactly. i chose 'yes, but not too much'. i like the community feeling i get when i come here. it's like being in a grade school class, but it's becoming more like a high school. dread if we ever get to college.
